p: The ICW assay was performed using the Odyssey Imaging System (LI-COR, Lincoln, NE, USA) [ 19]. Briefly, A549 cells grown in 96-well plates (2 Ã— 104 cells/well), either infected or mock-infected (Ctr) with PR8, were fixed with 4% formaldehyde, washed, permeabilized with 0.1% Triton X-100 and incubated with PBS containing Odyssey Blocking buffer (LI-COR Biosciences, Lincoln, NE, USA).
